column14: Prior signs of mental health issues

column9: Stephen Craig Paddock, 64, rained a barrage of rapid gunfire down on thousands of concertgoers on the Las Vegas Strip late on a Sunday night, firing from a room on the 32nd floor of the Mandalay Bay Casino and Resort. Shortly thereafter, he was found by law enforcement, deceased from a self-inflicted gunshot wound inside the hotel room.
column18: At least 16 firearms, mostly rifles, including two modified for "fully automatic"
column19: AR-15-style and AK-47-style rifles and "a large cache of ammunition"
